data.text: Madito ga Mkulu Nguluwi ndo makulu ng'hatu.
Chila choyalingudita chimema ukulu na lutogo,
Nakambuza madito ga heye ga kububuwaza gakumbuchilwe.
Nakawalajila wanhu wa heye mong'ho lwa madito ga heye,
Madito ga heye ndo ga hachi na ga kukundigwa,
Kumdumba Mkulu Nguluwi ndo msisi wa luhala,
